languages.text: "Тело убитого после смерти было изувечено. Вероятно, характер ран мог быть полезен при дознании, и злоумышленник предпочел их сокрыть".

"The body of the deceased was mutilated after death. It is likely that the nature of the injuries would have proven very useful in the investigation, and that the perpetrator concealed them for that very reason."
languages.original_text: "Тело убитого после смерти было изувечено. Вероятно, характер ран мог быть полезен при дознании, и злоумышленник предпочел их сокрыть".

traits.locale_text: "The body of the deceased was mutilated after death. It is likely that the nature of the wounds could have been useful in the investigation and the perpetrator had chosen to conceal them."
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "Der Leichnam des Verstorbenen wurde posthum verstümmelt. Wir gehen davon aus, dass die Art der Verletzungen für die Untersuchung äußerst hilfreich gewesen wäre und der Täter sie aus eben diesem Grund verbergen wollte."
languages.original_text: "The body of the deceased was mutilated after death. It is likely that the nature of the injuries would have proven very useful in the investigation, and that the perpetrator concealed them for that very reason."

traits.locale_text: "Der Leichnam des Verstorbenen wurde posthum verstümmelt. Wir gehen davon aus, dass die Art der Verletzungen für die Untersuchung äußerst hilfreich gewesen wäre und der Täter sie aus eben diesem Grund verbergen wollte.
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: « Le corps du défunt a été mutilé après sa mort. Il est probable que la nature des blessures aurait été utile à l'enquête, et que l'auteur du crime les a dissimulées pour cette même raison. »
languages.original_text: "The body of the deceased was mutilated after death. It is likely that the nature of the injuries would have proven very useful in the investigation, and that the perpetrator concealed them for that very reason."

traits.locale_text: « Le corps du défunt a été mutilé après sa mort. Il est probable que la nature des blessures aurait été utile à l'enquête, et que l'auteur du crime les a dissimulées pour cette même raison. »
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: «El cadáver de la víctima fue mutilado tras la muerte. Es probable que la naturaleza de las heridas fuese de mucha utilidad para la investigación, y que el asesino las encubriese por ese mismo motivo».
languages.original_text: "The body of the deceased was mutilated after death. It is likely that the nature of the injuries would have proven very useful in the investigation, and that the perpetrator concealed them for that very reason."

traits.locale_text: «El cadáver de la víctima fue mutilado tras la muerte. Es probable que la naturaleza de las heridas fuese de mucha utilidad para la investigación, y que el asesino las encubriese por ese mismo motivo».
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: 「死体は死後に切断されています。その傷の特徴は、操作に大いに役に立ったことでしょう。そしてそれこそが理由で、犯人は傷を隠すことにしたのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The body of the deceased was mutilated after death. It is likely that the nature of the injuries would have proven very useful in the investigation, and that the perpetrator concealed them for that very reason."

traits.locale_text: 「死体は死後に切断されています。その傷の特徴は、操作に大いに役に立ったことでしょう。そしてそれこそが理由で、犯人は傷を隠すことにしたのでしょう」
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: “死者的尸体是在死后遭到破坏的。死者身上的伤口可能对调查非常重要，破坏者正是出于这个原因，才掩饰了那些伤口。”
languages.original_text: "The body of the deceased was mutilated after death. It is likely that the nature of the injuries would have proven very useful in the investigation, and that the perpetrator concealed them for that very reason."

traits.locale_text: “死者的尸体是在死后遭到破坏的。死者身上的伤口可能对调查非常重要，破坏者正是出于这个原因，才掩饰了那些伤口。”
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline
